entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
